title: Play/Ground
descriptionHTML:
Play/Ground is an immersive and interactive festival aspiring to help women power their "happily ever afters" — whatever they may be. The extravaganza features distinct villages offering attendees full access to keynote discussions with A-list celebrities and pop-culture luminaries, live fitness and wellness activities, art installations, a shopping bazaar, a beauty carnival, and so much more.

Press

Teen Vogue
OK Magazine
Hollywood Magazine

credits.My Role: Icon Set, Social & Editorial Graphics, VIP Photo Backdrops, Merchandise
